metaDescription: Discover delicious recipes tailored to your location and access all the ingredients you need easily with MenuBites. Say goodbye to complex ingredient searches and enjoy hassle-free cooking!
app_description_1_title: Get an endless variety of recipes
app_description_1_description: With our AI-based technology, you can easily access your favorite recipes tailored to your unique taste preferences and dietary needs.
app_description_2_title: Stay Updated with Daily Recipe Inspiration
app_description_2_description: Subscribe to our newsletter and receive a daily dose of customized recipes based on your taste preferences. Never run out of culinary ideas with our AI-powered service.
app_description_3_title: Cook Smart with What You Have
app_description_3_description: Generate delicious recipes using ingredients already in your kitchen. Our app helps you cook creatively without the need to invest in ingredients you already own!
app_description_4_description: Unlock recipes tailored to your location and easily access all the ingredients you need. Say goodbye to complex ingredient searches and enjoy hassle-free cooking!
body_slogan: Culinary AI crafts recipes to suit your location and tastes.
body_slogan_description: Generates personalized recipes by AI, tailored to your ingredients, local produce, or favorite cuisine, ensuring a delightful culinary experience within your budget.
body_info_card_1_description: Get personalized recipes tailored to your unique style
body_info_card_2_description: Enjoy easy cooking with our simple-to-follow recipes
body_info_card_3_description: Find quick recipes for speedy meal solutions
call_to_action_call_to: Join our waitlist to be the first to receive updates about our product.
call_to_action_title_alert_email_submit_: Oooops there was an error D:
call_to_action_text_alert_email_submit_e: Please enter your email address before submitting the form.
